bill.summary:
Work Safe Act
This bill allows employers a tax credit for providing testing for COVID-19 (i.e., coronavirus disease 2019).
The bill also requires the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention to disclose the COVID-19 weekly positive case rate for each state and the United States for the most recent calendar week.
